mapper.select: select * from RoomReview where room_id = #{room_id} and user_id = review_writer
mapper.insert: Insert into RoomReview (review_id, user_id, room_id, review_writer, review_stars, review_ctt, created_at, created_id, updated_at, updated_id) values (#{review_id}, #{user_id}, #{room_id}, #{review_writer}, #{review_stars}, #{review_ctt}, now(), #{created_id}, now(), #{updated_id})
mapper.select: select u.user_nickname, rev.review_ctt, rev.created_at from RoomReview rev, Room r, User u where rev.room_id = r.room_id and r.user_id = u.user_id and rev.review_writer = #{user_id} order by created_at desc
